description:
Shower, rinse off salt water, clean a dirty bike, hose down the dishes, or wash the dog. The Helio LX has double the capacity of the original, and produces up to 20% more water pressure. Unlike most outdoor showers, it sits on the ground, so you don't need to find a place to hang it.

  • 3.05m hose with a spray nozzle
  • 22L reservoir provides enough water for a 7-10 minute shower
  • Foot pump to maintain water pressure
  • Includes ventilated carrying case
  • Durable polyurethane-coated polyester reservoir
  • Dimensions: 58 x 26cm, 16 x 26cm when packed
name: Nemo Helio LX Pressure Shower
